messages.0: Hi! I'm Yue, your virtual assistant! Need help navigating?

messages.3: Hey, I found a hidden easter egg! Want to see?

messages.5: Welcome to the website! How can I help you today?
messages.6: Feel free to explore around! There's lots to discover.
messages.7: Need to get in touch? Check out the contact section!
messages.8: Did you know this site is built with Next.js and TypeScript?
messages.9: Thanks for visiting! Hope you're having a great day!
messages.10: Want to see what's being worked on? Check out the projects!
messages.11: I love helping visitors and sharing knowledge. What about you?
messages.12: Dark mode or light mode? I support both!
messages.13: This website is fully responsive. Try resizing your browser!
messages.14: Found any bugs? Let me know and I'll help report them!
messages.15: I'm always learning new things. What's your latest discovery?
